CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 范围；界限；视觉（或听觉）范围；射程；射击距离；一系列；成套产品；系列商品；山脉；牧场；牧区；靶场；射击场；炸弹试验场；（尤指旧时的）炉灶；一排建筑物；（飞机等交通工具的）续航距离；（感情或行为的）波动范围
排列；排成行；使排成一行；使并列；行遍；变动；（在一定的范围内）变化；绵亘；绵延；延伸；延展；漫游；漫游于；游荡；徘徊；覆盖（一定区域）；涵盖（一定范围）；分布；分类；把…分类；包括（从…到…）之间的各类事物；测距；校准（瞄准距离）；（枪、炮等）具有特定射程；用（目光）扫过；放牧
（生活方式）有秩序的；安定的；<美>牧场的

synonym.mean: 平行，列为一行；延伸；漫游；射程达到
漫游；放牧；使并列；归类于；来回走动

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 又高又瘦的；适于远行的；宽广的
突击队员；漫游者；骑警；别动队员

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指小的土山、石山或浅丘。有时也指高山，复数表群山。
特指主要由喷出的熔岩和火山灰堆积而成的圆锥形火山。
通常指比hill高而陡的高山、山岳。但这种区别不是绝对的，“大”与“小”常常是相对而言。
常用于地名之前， 即一般放在专用名词前，书面用词。

word_group.brief_definition: 范围是从；幅度从；范围由
力度变化范围；力度比；最强音与最弱音之比
步枪靶场；步枪射击场；步枪射击摊点
巡航半径；续航距离；续航力
宽范围；宽波段；广泛范围
温度范围；温度区间；温度幅度

bilingual.source: Throughout the extract, the writer conveys the range and strength of Artie's feelings.
bilingual.target: 在整个摘录中，作者传达了阿蒂情感的范围和强度。
他们在一定的范围内工作。

bilingual.source: The range of this project is very broad.
The machine's tolerance range is very small.
bilingual.target: 机器的公差范围非常小。

bilingual.source: The target is out of range, unable to hit.
bilingual.target: 目标超出范围，无法击中。
他的声音范围相当令人印象深刻。

bilingual.source: The answer to this question is out of range.
bilingual.target: 这个问题的答案超出范围。

bilingual.source: We need to narrow the range of our discussion.
bilingual.target: 我们需要缩小讨论的范围。

bilingual.source: This speaker has a wide audio frequency range.
bilingual.target: 这个扬声器的音频范围很广。

list.abstract: range是一种计算机术语，在Excel中，Range集合代表某一单元格、某一行、某一列、某一选定区域（该区域可包含一个或若干连续单元格区域），或者某一三维区域。可用 Range(arg)（其中 arg 为区域名称）来返回代表单个单元格或单元格区域的 Range 对象。另外有同名汽车。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't start a hack on them until they're within a two mile range.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们要在两英里范围之内我们才能开始攻击他们的系统。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, no, she doesn't want that. She needs a point-to-point peer network with a range extender. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，她不需要那个，她需要一个扩大范围的点对点网络。谢谢你。

yingyinNormal.en: It's quite unique. As you all see it, it also fires a shotgun cartridge for use in messy close-range situations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很独特。正如你所见，这种枪也能用猎枪弹在复杂的近距范围进行射击。

yingyinNormal.en: TARS, factor an orbit of Gargantua. Conserve fuel, minimize thrusting, but make sure we stay in range of Miller's planet. You got it?
yingyinNormal.zh: TARS，找一条卡冈图亚的轨道，节省燃料，少用推进器，但要确保在Miller星球的范围内，明白吗？

yingyinNormal.en: So when it comes to policy, when you want to answer questions the side issue you care about, we should think about the broader range, a broader picture, a broader perspective. And doesn't just think about the rational person.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你要制定政策，当你要回答一些问题，你就要考虑一些细枝末节的问题，我们思考问题的范围应该更宽泛角度和视野也要更宽广我们不能只考虑理性的个人。。

yingyinNormal.en: The shot to the thorax was from close range. Close range meant it came from the accused, Jeffrey Grant. Okay, thanks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 胸部的那一枪是近距离打的，近距离就是说是来自被告人杰弗里·格兰特。好，谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: I have a job now. My range has changed. How many rooms?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在有工作了，所以预算也涨了，有几间卧室？

yingyinNormal.en: Long range and untraceable, it would be invisible to Klingon sensors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 射程远，难以被发现，可以对克林贡帝国的传感器隐形。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I warned you you'd fall in love with it. It's not really in your range.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我警告过你会爱上它的，它超出你的预算了。

yingyinNormal.en: If they clear this range and reach their destination, Ramsey's as good as gone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他们扫清障碍，顺利到达目的地的话，我们就再找不到拉姆齐了。

yingyinNormal.en: Energon detectors guard its cities now. Long range defense systems watch the skies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 能量块探测器保卫着地球上的城市，远程防御系统监视着天空。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, and evenly distributed amongst brown, white, free-range, large, extra large and jumbo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，棕蛋，白蛋，散养鸡蛋，大鸡蛋，加大鸡蛋，跟特大鸡蛋，各要8个。

yingyinNormal.en: Autopsy report says the gun was fired at close range, possibly pressed up against her temple.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尸检报告说开枪距离很近，很可能是杵着太阳穴的

yingyinNormal.en: There in the heart of Panem's steepest mountain range lies the Capitol's principal military facility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那里是帕纳姆最为险峻的所在，那里有国会区重要的军事基地。

yingyinNormal.en: Our intelligence suggests that Ramsey will be transported by an armed motorcade through the Caucasus mountain range.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的情报显示，拉姆齐会由一列武装车队护送，转移到高加索山脉。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the largest, and youngest, of the Hawaiian Islands and its still-growing landmass has a range of climate zones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大岛是夏威夷群岛中最大，也是最年轻的。它仍然在增长的陆地具有不同的气候带。

yingyinNormal.en: They'll take you to the US embassy, where an armored convoy stands by to get you out of Sam range. And on to a military train.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们会带你们去美国大使馆，那里会有一支武装车队待命，护送你们到地对空飞弹射程外，搭乘军用机。

yingyinNormal.en: Not a child? A child's coffin would be more expensive. This is in the lower price range, although still best available in that bracket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是孩童吗？孩童的棺材会更贵。这种价格较低。不过也是同档次中最好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we corrected the intercept range, but we got a problem with intercept velocity. How big a problem? 42 meters per second. Well, shit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们搞定了拦截距离的问题，但是相对速度还是不行。速度差多少？ 42米每秒。这，妈的。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been doing some research on strippers. One agency I spoke to, said I could get us a great price if we're flexible on age range and number of limbs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我研究了一下脱衣舞女，其中一家说如果不在乎表演者岁数与是否残疾，价钱绝对包君满意。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 延伸；漫游；变动；变化；安排；徘徊；（range的现在分词）
n. 幅度；范围；山脉；放牧地；牧场；狩猎场；大型多眼灶台；方向；走向

word_family.mean: n. 等级；军阶；军衔；横列；秩；（Rank）人名：兰克

sense_info_list.en: vary or extend between specified limits

examination_example.sentence: These <highlight>range</highlight> from around £500 to $5,000, and apparently the work gets more expensive the more that publishers do it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些（收费金额）从500英镑至5000美元不等，显而易见，出版机构的准备工作越多，文献发表便越昂贵。

examination_example.sentence: Runners <highlight>range</highlight> from four years old to grandparents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跑步者从四岁小孩到祖父母辈都有。

examination_example.sentence: Not everyone will agree with the authors' policy ideas, which <highlight>range</highlight> from mandating more holiday time to reducing tax incentives for American homebuyers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并非所有人都会同意作者的政策主张，从规定更多的假期到减少对美国购房者的税收激励。

sense_info_list.en: a set of different things of the same general type

examination_example.sentence: But just some 22, 000 birds remain today, occupying about 16% of the species' historic <highlight>range</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是今天只剩下大约22000只鸟，大约占据了这个物种历史范围的16%。

examination_example.sentence: The difference between today's workplace and the "dress for success" era is that the <highlight>range</highlight> of options is so much broader.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今的职场和“成功着装”时代的区别在于，选择的范围要大得多。

examination_example.sentence: Now utopia has grown unfashionable, as we have gained a deeper appreciation of the <highlight>range</highlight> of threats facing us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，随着我们更加深刻地认识到自己所面临的一系列威胁，这种乌托邦思想已经渐渐变得过时了。

examination_example.sentence: They afford an opportunity for people from all backgrounds to encounter a <highlight>range</highlight> of animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们（动物园）为各种背景的人提供了一个接触各种动物的机会。

examination_example.sentence: Studies have found that first-generation college students lag other students on a <highlight>range</highlight> of education achievement factors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究发现，“第一代大学生”在一系列的教育成就方面落后于其他学生。

examination_example.sentence: Emerging in the late Sixties and reaching a peak in the Seventies, Land Art was one of a <highlight>range</highlight> of new forms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地景艺术在六十年代末兴起，在七十年代达到高峰，是一系列新形式中的一种。

sense_info_list.en: run or extend in a line in a particular direction
(of a person or animal) travel or wander over a wide area

word_usage.usage: range既可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。用作不及物动词时，常与介词from搭配使用，用作及物动词时，可后接名词、代词作宾语。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 既可指人感觉或能力等到所达到的范围，也可指物可供选择的范围。
着重指某物朝一个方向延伸的范围或长度，但常用于引申意义，指广度或研究、知识等的范围。
指学术领域或活动和作用的范围等，强调选择和必要的限制。
着重指在理解、思考、调查、活动或应用等方面所能达到的范围。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 看守人；守护者；护林员；武装人员；高年级女童子军队员；漫游者；（Ranger）徘徊者号
adj. 覆盖范围大的；广泛的
n. 幅度；范围；山脉；放牧地；牧场；狩猎场；大型多眼灶台；方向；走向
n. 地位；等级；品类；等级评定

word_family.mean: n. 等级；军阶；军衔；横列；秩；（Rank）人名：兰克

sense_info_list.en: a set of different things of the same general type

examination_example.sentence: Moreover, vision is used by micro bats to travel over long distances, beyond the <highlight>range</highlight> of echolocation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，微型蝙蝠利用视觉进行长距离旅行，超出了回声定位的范围。

examination_example.sentence: That institute examined a wider <highlight>range</highlight> of potential problems for humanity, while the LCFI has a narrow focus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该研究所研究了范围更广的人类潜在问题，而LCFI关注的范围很窄。

examination_example.sentence: Users probably <highlight>range</highlight> from climate-change researchers, to foresters looking for information on different grades of timber.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用户的范围涵盖从气候变化研究人员，到正在寻找有关不同等级木材信息的林务人员。

sense_info_list.en: a set of different things of the same general type

examination_example.sentence: The waste has been put down to burning old cosmetic stock to make way for their new beauty <highlight>range</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了给他们的新化妆品系列让路，这些垃圾被用来焚烧旧化妆品库存。

examination_example.sentence: Collegial (同事的) ties can help overcome a <highlight>range</highlight> of workplace issues affecting productivity and the quality of work output.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同事关系可以帮助解决一系列职场问题的。这些问题往往会影响工作效率和工作质量。

sense_info_list.en: vary or extend between specified limits
run or extend in a line in a particular direction
place or arrange in a row or rows or in a specified order or manner

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 看守人；守护者；护林员；武装人员；高年级女童子军队员；漫游者；（Ranger）徘徊者号
adj. 覆盖范围大的；广泛的
n. 幅度；范围；山脉；放牧地；牧场；狩猎场；大型多眼灶台；方向；走向

word_family.mean: n. 等级；军阶；军衔；横列；秩；（Rank）人名：兰克

examination_example.sentence: So far, participants have <highlight>ranged</highlight> in age from 2 to 85.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，参与者的年龄从2岁到85岁不等。

examination_example.sentence: This year, the programs <highlight>range</highlight> from one that turns the house into a collaborative essay to one that explores the meaning of exile.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年，项目多种多样，从在一间房子(墙面)写满协作文章到探索流放的意义，不一而足。

examination_example.sentence: The aquifers <highlight>range</highlight> from 1, 000 to 3, 000 feet below the ground, which means that pumping will be expensive and there are other concerns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地下蓄水层的高度在地下1,000到3,000英尺之间，这意味着抽水会很昂贵，以及其他的问题。

examination_example.sentence: The codes — which typically <highlight>range</highlight> in price from $ 80 to $ 155 per course — give students online access to systems developed by education companies like McGraw Hill and Pearson.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 代码(通常每门课程的价格从80美元到155美元不等)使学生可以在线访问由麦格·劳希尔(McGraw Hill)和皮尔森(Pearson)等教育公司开发的系统。

sense_info_list.en: vary or extend between specified limits

examination_example.sentence: Technology has penetrated into every corner of modem society, <highlight>ranging</highlight> from manufacturing industry to family life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 技术已经渗透到现代社会的每一个角落，从制造业到家庭生活。

examination_example.sentence: This means they have overwhelming negative emotions towards the subject, <highlight>ranging</highlight> from rage to despair.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着他们对这个话题有着压倒性的负面情绪，从愤怒到绝望。

examination_example.sentence: The agency says projections of the number of unemployed people this year <highlight>range</highlight> from 210 million to nearly 240 million people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该机构说，预计今年失业人数在2.1亿到近2.4亿之间。

sense_info_list.en: a set of different things of the same general type

examination_example.sentence: The city's council and ScottishPower have announced a <highlight>range</highlight> of strategies in an attempt to reduce carbon emissions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该市议会和苏格兰电力公司宣布了一系列策略来试图减少碳排放。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>range</highlight> of experts expressed concern that tying allowance very closely to chores may not be ideal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些专家表示担心，将津贴与家务紧密联系在一起可能并不理想。

examination_example.sentence: Like humans, killer whales have colonized a <highlight>range</highlight> of different habitats across the globe, occupying every ocean basin on the planet, with an empire that extends from pole to pole.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像人类一样，虎鲸聚居于全球各不相同的栖息地，占据了地球上的每个海洋盆地，拥有从一极延伸到另一极的帝国。

sense_info_list.en: run or extend in a line in a particular direction
(of a person or animal) travel or wander over a wide area

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 看守人；守护者；护林员；武装人员；高年级女童子军队员；漫游者；（Ranger）徘徊者号
n. 幅度；范围；山脉；放牧地；牧场；狩猎场；大型多眼灶台；方向；走向

word_family.mean: n. 等级；军阶；军衔；横列；秩；（Rank）人名：兰克

examination_example.sentence: Generalists, on the other hand, know a lot about a wide <highlight>range</highlight> of subjects and view the whole with all its connections.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，通才则对广泛的学科有很多了解，并通过所有的联系来观察整体。

examination_example.sentence: We had a <highlight>range</highlight> of words that express different grades of gratitude.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有一系列表达不同程度感激的词汇。

examination_example.sentence: It can be quite an eye opener to see the <highlight>range</highlight> of classical apples still in existence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看到经典苹果系列仍然存在，真是让人大开眼界。

examination_example.sentence: Activities there <highlight>range</highlight> from whale watching to hiking (远足) and accommodations aim to have a low impact on the natural environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那里的活动包括观赏鲸鱼、徒步旅行和住宿，目的都是尽量减小对自然环境的影响。

examination_example.sentence: To become a specialist, one may have to narrow his <highlight>range</highlight> of knowledge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要想成为专家，就得缩小知识面。

examination_example.sentence: Color choices in this <highlight>range</highlight> are a step up from the small ones in two major ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个范围内的颜色选择比小范围的颜色有两个主要的提升。

examination_example.sentence: This new weapon is called a Long <highlight>Range</highlight> Acoustic Device (LRAD, 远程定向声波发射器).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种新武器被称为远程定向声波发射器。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 看守人；守护者；护林员；武装人员；高年级女童子军队员；漫游者；（Ranger）徘徊者号
n. 幅度；范围；山脉；放牧地；牧场；狩猎场；大型多眼灶台；方向；走向

word_family.mean: n. 等级；军阶；军衔；横列；秩；（Rank）人名：兰克

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 范围是从；幅度从；范围由

examination_example.sentence: Labor education, also called education on the hardworking spirit, <highlight>range</highlight> from housework to school labor and community voluntary services (社会志愿服务).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 劳动教育又称勤劳精神教育，包括家务劳动、学校劳动、社区志愿服务等。

examination_example.sentence: Plants <highlight>range</highlight> from various species of cactuto pine forests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 植物种类繁多，有各种各样的仙人掌松林。

examination_example.sentence: There are a number of companies that create robots to teach subjects to children, <highlight>ranging</highlight> (范围) from biology to computer science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有许多公司制造机器人来教孩子们从生物学到计算机科学等学科。

examination_example.sentence: Although the coral reef had the widest <highlight>range</highlight> of biodiversity, all the other habitats were full of life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然珊瑚礁拥有最广泛的生物多样性，但所有其他栖息地都充满了生命。

examination_example.sentence: The tidal <highlight>range</highlight> is more than 10 metres.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 潮差超过10米。
